title: What is "Bingo"? âœˆï¸ | Full Boom XB-1 Startup Guide (Cold & Dark)
description:
Ever wondered what a "Bingo" setting is on a supersonic jet? ğŸš€ Join me as we take the Boom XB-1 from a cold start to ready-for-takeoff! We cover the entire startup checklist, beginning with critical external walkarounds and moving into the cockpit for internal systems prep.

The highlight? We stop at the "Bingo" checklist item to break down exactly what it means, run a quick calculation example, and show you how to set it correctly before we light the engines. Whether you are flying in MSFS or just love aviation tech, this guide has you covered.

ğŸ“– Chapters
00:00 - intro
00:14 - intro video
00:37 - removing the external covers
02:38 - preflight checks - before starting engine
07:05 - preflight checks - starting the engine
10:25 - preflight checks - what is the Bingo value?
18:51 - preflight checks - starting the left engine
23:56 - preflight checks - starting the center engine
25:48 - preflight checks - starting the right engine
28:16 - preflight checks - before taxi
31:42 - recap
32:11 - outro video

ğŸ“·Quick camera views

- shift 1: center cockpit view
- shift 2: flight controller functions
- shift 3: fuel and hydraulic functions
- shift 4: electrical and pressure functions
- shift 5: throttle and engine starters
- shift 6: warning/CAS panel
- shift 7: look front right 
- shift 8: look right back
- shift 9: reset view
- shift 0: not assigned
